body_html: As stated in the documentation, we require a valid probability distribution. Unfortunately, for speed reasons, we don't check this precondition. Therefore, this is expected behavior. Implementing your own loss in terms of other ops is the right fix.

body: As stated in the documentation, we require a valid probability distribution.  Unfortunately, for speed reasons, we don't check this precondition.  Therefore, this is expected behavior.  Implementing your own loss in terms of other ops is the right fix.
